welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Alfortville, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. Bon voyage!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in some areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving only private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals (2A to 2G).

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A small terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection every 15 minutes.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
